name: Johann Gottlieb Fichte
main_interests: Self-consciousness and Self-awareness, Moral Philosophy, Political Philosophy
influences: Immanuel Kant, Karl Leonhard Reinhold, Gottlob Ernst Schulze, Baruch de Spinoza, Jean-Jacques Rousseau, Salomon Maimon
notable_ideas: Absolute consciousness, thesis–antithesis–synthesis, the not-I, ''das Streben'' (striving), mutual recognition, ''Wissenschaftslehre'', ''Anstoss'', ''Tathandlung'', ''Urtrieb'' (original drive)
